CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 23, 1946, pg. 18 reads: "Trinity Anniversary Successful - An overflow crowd attended the all-day program celebrating the forty-second anniversary of Trinity AME Church of Pittsburgh, last Sunday. The event also commemorated the anniversary of forty-two years in ministry for the pastor, the Rev. B.W. Ford.  Left to right are the Rev. Mr. Ford, the Rev. S.J. Wright, Bishop D. Ward Nichols of the Ninth Episcopal District, AME Church, principal speaker; the Rev. J.W. Henderson and the Rev. Hubert N. Robinson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of six women, two wearing choir robes, and two men, including minister, with Rev. J. W. Henderson and Rev. Hubert N. Robinson, standing right, with choir in background, posed in Trinity AME Church during forty-second anniversary
